page.title: 02Broughton
page.content: The population and housing will increase at the same rate over the next 10years, because of Broughtons character and location the demand for housing will continue. There are just enough recreation and leisure centres in Broughton. Although there are a number of recreational activities, the facilities have not really kept pace with the recent growth in population. In a recent survey 65% of the people surveyed claimed the facilities are inadaquate. There are plans to provide more facilities in the next ten years for extra poulation.
